title: Benga (1893) Romans - Revelation Vol. 2
description: Benga translation of the first four chapters of Genesis translated in 1863 by the Reverend W. Benga is a Bantu language spoken by the Benga people of Equatorial Guinea and Gabon.

language.name: Benga
language.location: Equatorial Guinea, Gabon and São Tomé e Príncipe
